About Me

A few things about myself...

BIO

Hello, my name is Christopher Lopez, I am passionate about software engineering and the development of web applications of the future. I am an expert in software and solutions design for major projects and enterprises and have a developed understanding of executive-level strategic thinking through my deep understanding of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and Python and their applications when using with frameworks and libraries such as Node.js, React, and Django. I pride myself on the ability to work cross-functionally and in any environment. I specialize in: JavaScript, React, Django, Computer Architecture, HTML, CSS

Cybersecurity Analyst

I performed original research on the effect of digital signatures by developing a Java app that would generate unique digital signatures for documents as well as keys. Was launched in August 2017 at San Jose State University for research.

Lambda School

Currently attending Lambda School's fullstack and computer science program> Lambda school is a computer science academy which teaches all skills that are in demand including JavaScript, Python, and C. Students are expected to learn computing from its most fundamental levels. By the end of Lambda, students will be able to do any Frontend, backend, server, database, API, security, and computer science development.

Gavilan College

Earned an Associates of Science in Scientific Programming from Gavilan College. Scientific Programming prepares students for entry-level scientific programming in a wide variety of occupations. Many of the courses will be needed for students transferring to a university to study Computer Science. Students planning to transfer need to research lower division major requirements at the transfer destination of their choice.
